participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and ambitious, Emily is someone who doesn't back down from a challenge. She has a playful side, especially when it comes to her dog.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is a friendly and jovial person, always making jokes and lightening the mood. He has a strong sense of family and takes pride in his work.
participant_2.background: i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. i've three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

content.text: Hey! Are you a professional tennis player? Because I am.
Hahn that is a strange diet for a lizard !
